channel.title: Cult in the Jungle Republic 2 - Town Wins
channel.description:
# Welcome to Cult in the Jungle Republic 2!
This is a multiball setup where the mafia and the cult must compete against each other to win. ## Mechanics • Days last 72 hours, and nights last 24 hours. • Lynch is majority. There is no day one lynch, and day one ends when all players have confirmed. • Both the mafia and the cult have a night chat, but do not have a day chat. • Cultists win 1v1v1 scenarios, and equal numbered mafia and cult with no townies scenarios. • There are no wills/journals. ### Night Actions Order • The **[color=lime]Cop[/color]** investigates their target, finding out if they are a member of **[color=red]The Mafia[/color]** or not. • The night kill targets of the **[color=lime]Anytime Vigilante[/color]** and/or **[color=red]The Mafia[/color]** become immune to being recruited by the cult. • A **[color=magenta]Cultist[/color]** attempts to recruit their target. It will only succeed if they are a **[color=lime]Citizen[/color]** that is *not* the target of a night kill. • The targets of the **[color=lime]Anytime Vigilante[/color]** and/or **[color=red]The Mafia[/color]** are killed. ## Rolelist **[color=red]Mafia Goon[/color] x4** **[color=magenta]Cultist[/color]** **[color=lime]Cop[/color]** **[color=lime]Anytime Vigilante[/color]** **[color=lime]Citizen[/color] x12** ## Role Cards > ## [color=red]Mafia Goon[/color] > **Loyal (Passive)** - You can't be recruited into the cult. **Factional Kill (Night)** - Each night phase, a mafia member may perform the factional kill. The player you target is immune to being recruited by the cult. *You win when a majority of the living players are mafia, or when nothing can prevent this from happening.* > ## [color=magenta]Cultist[/color] > **Recruit (Night)** - You may recruit a player at night. You may only recruit citizens. If you recruit anyone else or a nightkill target, your recruit will fail. There can only ever be at most four cultists, including dead cultists. *You win when a majority of the living players are cultists, or when nothing can prevent this from happening.* > ## [color=lime]Cop[/color] > **Loyal (Passive)** - You can not be recruited into the cult. **Investigate (Night)** - Each night phase, you may investigate one player. You will get results back in the form of Mafia/Not Mafia (Cultists appear as Not Mafia). *You win when all threats to the town have been eliminated and there is at least one town player alive.* > ## [color=lime]Anytime Vigilante[/color] > **Loyal (Passive)** - You can not be recruited into the cult. **Shoot (Day/Night)** - Once per day/night cycle, you may kill a player. A day/night cycle is determined by the number in Day or Night. For instance, Day 2 and Night 2 are in the same day/night cycle. Night 2 and Day 3 are in different day/night cycles. You can not kill a player on Day 1. The player you target is immune to being recruited by the cult. *You win when all threats to the town have been eliminated and there is at least one town player alive.* > ## [color=lime]Citizen[/color] > Your weapon is your vote. You have no night actions. *You win when all threats to the town have been eliminated and there is at least one town player alive.* ## Player List 1. **Marluxion** 2. **Margaret** 3. Livicus - Condeded - **[color=magenta]Cultist[/color]** 4. [Solic's Slot] - Modkilled N3 - **[color=magenta]Cultist[/color]** 5. **Sam17z** 6. **Firekitten** 7. Wolfy - Died N3 - **[color=limegreen]Cop[/color]** 8. **PoisonedSquid** 9. **MtheJoker** 10. Alice - Died N1 - **[color=limegreen]Citizen[/color]** 11. MathBlade - Lynched D3 - **[color=red]Goon[/color]** 12. Noz_Bugz - Died N2 - **[color=limegreen]Citizen[/color]** 13. **htm** 14. Marcus_Doodalee - Died N1 - **[color=limegreen]Citizen[/color]** 15. Shurian - Shot D2 - **[color=red]Goon[/color]** 16. **bazingaboy** 17. MaximusPrime - Shot D4 - **[color=red]Goon[/color]** 18. Icibalus - Lynched D2 - **[color=red]Goon[/color]** 19. techwolves - Shot D3 - **[color=limegreen]Citizen[/color]** ## Links: **[Start of Day One](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/cult-in-the-jungle-republic-2-night-two-seeking-replacement-15-19/71979/148?u=ashe)** **[Start of Day Two](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/cult-in-the-jungle-republic-2-night-two-seeking-replacement-15-19/71979/332?u=ashe)** ## Spectators: 1. Lightsin 2. Gamerpoke 3. Pug 4. Nerbins 5. Blizer 6. Captain ## Graveyard: 0. **[color=darkgray]"Mislynch Marl" Jokes[/color]** - Died from not being funny :^) 1. Marcus - Died N1 - **[color=limegreen]Citizen[/color]** 2. Alice - Died N1 - **[color=limegreen]Citizen[/color]** 3. Shurian - Shot D2 - **[color=red]Goon[/color]** 4. Icibalus - Lynched D2 - **[color=red]Goon[/color]** 5. Noz_Bugz - Died N2 - **[color=limegreen]Citizen[/color]** 6. techwolves - Shot D3 - **[color=limegreen]Citizen[/color]** 7. Mathblade - Lynched D3 - **[color=red]Goon[/color]** 8. Wolfy - Died N3 - **[color=limegreen]Cop[/color]** 9. [Solic's Slot] - Modkilled N3 - **[color=magenta]Cultist[/color]** 10. MaximusPrime - Shot D4 - **[color=red]Goon[/color]** 11. Livicus - Condeded - **[color=magenta]Cultist[/color]**
